TEXT: Spare both of the Cultists in the Awakened One fight.
Complete the Ending on Ascension Level 20.
Complete the Ending after having obtained all 3 Keys in Exordium.
Beat the game with a 50 card deck or larger.
Beat the game with a deck containing at least 5 Curses.
Beat the game after having defeated at least 12 Elites.
Beat the game while having a max Energy count of 6.
Beat the game with at most 24 max HP.
Beat the game after having defeated 3 Burning Elites.
Beat the game with a deck containing at least 3 cards of each color.
Beat the game while having at least 150 max HP.
As The Watcher, beat the game without ever having entered Calm.
As The Watcher, beat the game without ever having entered Wrath.
Defeat an Exploder using The Bomb.
Beat the game while having both Runic Pyramid and Snecko Eye at the same time.
Defeat the Champ with a Signature Move.
Beat the game with a deck containing no Powers.
Beat the game with a deck containing no Attacks.
Beat the game with a deck where the only Attacks are ones that contain "Strike".
Beat the game while having Mark of the Bloom.
Defeat Book of Stabbing with a Lesson Learned.
Play Grand Finale twice in a single turn.
